roleset.name: to make peace

example.name: verb
example.text: Assembly calls for *PRO* peacemaking in Isreal/Palestine.

example.name: adjective
example.text: Do you think the ~UN can still play the role that ~FDR and other Americans at the time thought 0 it could of *PRO* being the peacemaking uh organization 0 *T*-2 to keep us from *PRO*-3 fighting war after war in the world?

roleset.note: PEACEMAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'peacemake' based on sentences in the ebc. No Verbnet entry. (from peacemake.01-v predicate notes)
